magicvariant.name: Slumbering Overpowered Pact Weapon of Doom™

inherits.namePrefix: Slumbering Overpowered Pact Weapon of Doom™
entries: FLUFF
When used as a Pact Weapon, this weapon has the following properties:
If you have the Weapon Mastery feature, you can always use the mastery property of this weapon regardless of your chosen masteries.
This weapon has 6 charges. While holding it, you can expend charges for the following effects:

items.name: Change Form (1 charge)
entries: The weapon changes form into a melee weapon of your choice (no action required).

items.name: Change Form (2 charges)
entries: The weapon changes form into a ranged weapon of your choice (no action required). It can produce its own ammunition when fired.
It regains 1d4-1 charges on a short rest, and 1d4+1 charges on a long rest.

magicvariant.name: Stirring Overpowered Pact Weapon of Doom™

inherits.namePrefix: Stirring Overpowered Pact Weapon of Doom™
entries: FLUFF
When used as a Pact Weapon, this weapon has the following properties:
You gain a {=bonusWeapon} bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon and it deals an additional {@damage {=bonusWeapon}d6} damage on hit.
If you have the Weapon Mastery feature, you can always use the mastery property of this weapon regardless of your chosen masteries.
You gain the Eldritch Smite invocation.
This weapon has 6 charges. While holding it, you can expend charges for the following effects:

items.name: Change Form (1 charge)
entries: The weapon changes form into a melee weapon of your choice (no action required).

items.name: Change Form (2 charges)
entries: The weapon changes form into a ranged weapon of your choice (no action required). It can produce its own ammunition when fired.

items.name: Cast Patron Spell (1–5 charges)
entries: You spend charges equal to one of your Patron spells’ level to cast that spell at its base level.
It regains 1d4-1 charges on a short rest, and 1d4+1 charges on a long rest.

magicvariant.name: Wakened Overpowered Pact Weapon of Doom™

inherits.namePrefix: Wakened Overpowered Pact Weapon of Doom™
entries: FLUFF
When used as a Pact Weapon, this weapon has the following properties:
You gain a {=bonusWeapon} bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon and it deals an additional {@damage {=bonusWeapon}d6} damage on hit.
If you have the Weapon Mastery feature, you can always use the mastery property of this weapon regardless of your chosen masteries.
You gain the Eldritch Smite invocation. Once per short rest, you can use your Eldritch Smite without expending a spell slot.
When dealing damage with this weapon or your Eldritch Smite, you can change the damage type to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.
This weapon has 6 charges. While holding it, you can expend charges for the following effects:

items.name: Change Form (1 charge)
entries: The weapon changes form into a melee weapon of your choice (no action required).

items.name: Change Form (2 charges)
entries: The weapon changes form into a ranged weapon of your choice (no action required). It can produce its own ammunition when fired.

items.name: Cast Patron Spell (1–5 charges)
entries: You spend charges equal to one of your Patron spells’ level to cast that spell at its base level.
It regains 1d4-1 charges on a short rest, and 1d4+1 charges on a long rest.
